comment: Obsolete version of ~ sbn as of 8-Jul-2023. Substitution is not affected by negation. Version of ~ sbn with a disjoint variable condition, not requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Jan-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
